p: Several catalysts with nanocellulose as a support and inorganic compounds as active ingredients have been synthesized for biodiesel production [26, 27] Nonetheless, very few studies have evaluated the effect of nanocellulose supports on the catalytic activities of nanohematite and nanozirconia. To bridge this gap, the present study probes the effect of nanocellulose loading on the performance of cellulose@ α-Fe2O3–ZrO2 nanocomposites for biodiesel production from lauric acid.
